cases.title: Admiralty & Maritime Expert Witness Allowed to Testify in Slip & Fall Case
cases.description: The court ruled an Admiralty & Maritime Expert Witness could testify in a case where Plaintiff allegedly slipped on an icy deck of a booster barge.

cases.title: Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness Excluded from Testifying on "Reasonable Prudent Person" Standard
cases.description: Plaintiff's Accident Reconstruction Expert Witness could not testify on the decedent's state of mind in a tractor-trailer vs. auto accident.

cases.title: Emergency Medicine Expert Witness Could Testify in Attempted Suicide Case
cases.description: An Emergency Medicine Expert Witness was allowed to testify as to whether CPR should have been given to a fourteen year old boy who tried to hang himself.
